sourcesContent:
navigate(`/hotel/${hotel.id}`)} style={{ display: "flex", border: "1px solid #ddd", borderRadius: "10px", overflow: "hidden", boxShadow: "0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)", cursor: "pointer", transition: "transform 0.2s", maxWidth: "800px", // Overall card width limit margin: "0 auto", }} > {/* Left: Image */} {/* Right: Details */}

{hotel.name}

{hotel.location}

{hotel.address}

Rating: {hotel.rating}

Phone: {hotel.phoneno}
